meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Vancouver Public Schools – The district website for Vancouver Public Schools: program and school information.

meta.content:
Breakfast and lunch are provided in one stop to children aged 0-18, or currently enrolled in high school. The free breakfast and lunches are available Monday through Friday between 10 a.m. and noon in front of the following schools. Please remember to observe social distancing when picking up meals.
Anderson Elementary, 2215 NE 104th St.

fusion-alert alert error alert-danger fusion-alert-left alert-dismissable

p.strong: Breakfast and lunch are provided in one stop to children aged 0-18, or currently enrolled in high school. The free breakfast and lunches are available Monday through Friday between 10 a.m. and noon in front of the following schools. Please remember to observe social distancing when picking up meals.

ul.li: Fruit Valley Elementary, 3410 NW Fruit Valley Rd.
Jason Lee Middle School, 8500 NW 9th Ave.
McLoughlin Middle School, 5802 MacArthur Blvd. Location changed to the former Marshall Elementary, just to the east at 6400 MacArthur Blvd.

span.p: Free meals will continue Monday through Friday throughout the school closure. No paperwork or identification is required. Food pantries also are operating around Vancouver.

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_2_3 fusion-builder-column-1 fusion-two-third fusion-column-first fusion-animated 2_3

a.aria-label: OSPI issues new grading rules for high school courses | Español | Русский l Fóósun Chuuk

h2.a: OSPI issues new grading rules for high school courses | Español | Русский l Fóósun Chuuk

div.p: Washington state teachers must follow these rules when determining grades for high school course credit during the COVID-19 school closure.

article.class: fusion-post-grid post-60851 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus-general

a.aria-label: The #VPSamazing work continues l Русский l Español

img.alt: School nurse with sign that reads, "Believe in yourself. We believe in you!"

h2.a: The #VPSamazing work continues l Русский l Español

div.p: Our community partners and employees have worked tirelessly to provide food, basic necessities, child care, technology, instruction, learning support, nursing, counseling and problem-solving assistance.

article.class: fusion-post-grid post-60844 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-secondary-schools-6-12 category-vps-achievements

a.aria-label: Four Vancouver high schools among top in state, country

h2.a: Four Vancouver high schools among top in state, country

div.p: All four schools have appeared on the list in previous years.

span.em: In partnership with home and community, Vancouver Public Schools provides an innovative learning environment that engages and empowers each student to develop the knowledge and essential skills to become a competent, responsible and compassionate citizen.
